about_the_game:
Another Hidden Orchestra will be on tour! The puppies are clumsy, but they are musical!

The Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra is a hidden object game with musical elements. It's a sequel to the game Shy Cats Hidden Orchestra, where each hidden character found unlocks a new musical instrument inside each game's level. Thus, you'll be able to create your own songs as you find cute little dogs hidden by beautiful 2D cartoon backgrounds.

  • Explore ten more new levels in cartoon hand-drawn style.
  • Build ten new songs composed exclusively for the game.
  • Find over 200 hidden shy puppies.

Make your own music!

name: Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra is a hidden object game where you need to find musician dogs that are embarassed to play their music. It's like Shy Cats Hidden Orchesta, when you find them, they will play songs for you.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
